A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved it. I saw IV\, V\, VI in the movie theater when I was a kid. I was not a fan of I\, II\, III - I liked the story arc\, but not the characters/actors. Last Jedi was very cool in my opinion and I love VII\, III.5\, and now VIII. Big Fan of what Disney is doing with the Universe. I have read a couple books\, and read a couple comics/graphic novels. I wanted to add my 5 because I think the 52% on RT right now is heavily skewed by a few nay-sayers and I wanted to add light to their dark.
